parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
Joseph, a proper name. Of Hebrew origin; Joseph, the name of seven Israelites.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name. Akin to the base of keleuo; to 'call'.
Of Chaldee origin; son of Sabas; Bar-sabas, the name of two Israelites.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) To call (name) by a supplementary (additional, alternative) name, (b) mid: To call upon, appeal to, address.
Of Latin origin; Justus, the name of three Christian.
Matthias. Apparently a shortened form of Mattathias; Matthias, an Israelite.
